Jab tk ap apne employee ko bas employee hi mante ho to ho li growth jab tujhe bharat pay se bachane k liye side kr rhe the to vesa hi hoga.. jin din employee ko apni family man li to fir dekhna growth... Google and YT k office dekh le ek br or har trhe ko facility hoti hai sbka dyn rakha jata tu... Tum jaise hi dusro ki company ki hi depend rehte h... Ki glti ho or uski glti duniya ko btaye or khud honest bn jaye

Nonsense bol reha hai tabhi BHARATPAY ne nikala . koi badi company GOOGLE, TATA, Apple ki tarah is mindset ke saath bana bhi nahi payega. Tabhi ye sabhi se ladta hai, kisi se bhi iski banti nahi. His logic is correct when u work in company for 4-5 hours. Think,u spent more than 70% of your daily time in office and commuting. So office culture is very important for easygoing life and less stress.There u meet with diverse personalities.At home in metros u see only face of spouse and child. TT , ca
He's absolutely right hamari Indian chhutia public culture ke naam pe emotional hoke kuch bhi bakwaas karne lagte hai jiska corporate world se dur dur tak koi rishta nahi hai nahi hona chahiye

Startup me culture nahi hota. Once company stabilized then talk of culture. But culture should not be like entertainment inaide office or animals in office. Rather it should be like having a separate space for relaxation like game rooms that existed in old state companies with chess carrom and tt etc

Mene ek startup me work Kiya tha waha mene ek bat notice ki ki wo 10 se 15 yr se market me the but unke client 3se 4 hi project the.. Badme notice Kiya ki unke environment me office politics jyada thi and usme manager ki involvement jyada thi That's reason they not grow......... Mene bhi wo job final chod di...... mere sath bhi yahi ho raha, mai ek startup me kam karti hu as a Business analyst, but manager ko nhi pta ki BA ka kam kya hota hai. O BA ka sara kam fuctional consultant se karvate hai. ek mam hai jo FC hai senior hai maine unko bola ki mujhe main task karna hai BA ka to o boli ki mai jo task deti hu o karo pahle tabhi sikhoge tabhi to tumhe real task dete hai jabki mujhe Odoo aati hai jo task deti hai o sab karke deti hu mai. but fir bhi usne aisa kiya. i think use dar hai ki agar mai BA kam ka
